metadata.title: Visa Platinum Credit Card - Benefits for Every Lifestyle | Emirates NBD

content:
At a glance
Get rewarded for all your retail spends
Minimum salary:  12,000
Free insurance for big purchases
Exclusive current offer:
No Annual Fees
Key benefits and highlights
Plus Points
1.5 points for every  100 spend
0.4% points for supermarkets, groceries, insurance and car dealership spends
0.2% points for fuel, utility bill payments, real estate and education spends
Plus Points earning cap per statement is applicable.
Click here
to know more
Interest rate: 3.25% per month; minimum payment: 5% of the outstanding or  100, whichever is higher
Interest-free period up to 55 days for retail purchases related fees and charges

Looking for something different?
LuLu 247 Platinum Credit Card
Earn up to 7% back as LuLu Points on your daily spends and with no minimum spend requirement
Know more
Visa Flexi Credit Card
Introducing the Visa Flexi Credit Card – this first-of-its-kind card allows you to choose the benefits that matter the most to you
Know more
Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage.
Key features
0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance
Up to  300,000 decease cover per cardholder
 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization
Up to  60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment
